Method Detail

getMorphtarget

public java.util.List<MorphingMesh.Morphtarget> getMorphtarget()
Gets the value of the morphtarget property.

This accessor method returns a reference to the live list, not a snapshot. Therefore any modification you make to the returned list will be present inside the JAXB object. This is why there is not a set method for the morphtarget property.

For example, to add a new item, do as follows: 

    getMorphtarget().add(newItem);

Objects of the following type(s) are allowed in the list MorphingMesh.Morphtarget
